Faddân Dînâr
4 9 1/3 + 1/12
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
This is a document from ʿAbd al-Ḥamîd b. Yaḥyâ for Ismaʿîl b. A[
two faddâns fallow belonging to the land of al-Qâsim, that thou mayest sow with wheat ......... [
for four dînârs and a half and a third (of a dînâr). I have, therefore, granted thee [this
by the instalments due to the Governor at the due time. Sow, then, with the blessing of God [
for the impost of the year two hundred and s[even(?)]teen. [
and two faddâns of that which was in thy hands during the past year .... [
thou mayest sow it with wheat 4 1/2 + 1/12 reckoning at (the rate) of 2 1/6 + 1/8 (dînârs per faddân).
